member.name: M:WaveEngine.Adapter.TextFieldAlertView.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.para: The default implementation of this method does nothing on iOS 5.1 and earlier. Otherwise, the default implementation uses any constraints you have set to determine the size and position of any subviews.

Subclasses can override this method as needed to perform more precise layout of their subviews. You should override this method only if the autoresizing and constraint-based behaviors of the subviews do not offer the behavior you want. You can use your implementation to set the frame rectangles of your subviews directly.

You should not call this method directly. If you want to force a layout update, call the method instead to do so prior to the next drawing update. If you want to update the layout of your views immediately, call the method.

member.name: T:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL
member.summary: This struct represent all parameters supported in OpenGL for BlendStateDescription.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.BlendOperationColor
member.summary: This blend operation defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.SourceBlendColor
member.summary: This blend option specifies the operation to perform on the RGB value that the pixel shader outputs. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.DestintantionBlendColor
member.summary: This blend option specifies the operation to perform on the current RGB value in the render target. The BlendOp member defines how to combine the SrcBlend and DestBlend operations.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.BlendOperationAlpha
member.summary: This blend operation defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.SourceBlendAlpha
member.summary: This blend option specifies the operation to perform on the alpha value that the pixel shader outputs. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.DestinationBlendAlpha
member.summary: This blend option specifies the operation to perform on the current alpha value in the render target. Blend options that end in _COLOR are not allowed. The BlendOpAlpha member defines how to combine the SrcBlendAlpha and DestBlendAlpha operations.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.OpenGL.BlendStateDescriptionGL.#ctor(WaveEngine.Common.Graphics.BlendStateDescription@)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

member.name: T:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL
member.summary: This struct represent all parameters supported in OpenGL for DepthStencilStateDescription.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.DepthWriteMask
member.summary: Indentify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer that can be modified by depth data.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.DepthFunction
member.summary: A function that compares depth data against existing depth data.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.StencilWriteMask
member.summary: Identify a portion of the depth-stencil buffer for writing stencil data.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.FrontStencilFailOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.FrontStencilDepthFailOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.FrontStencilPassOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.FrontStencilFunction
member.summary: A function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.BackStencilFailOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing fails.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.BackStencilDepthFailOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing passes and depth testing fails.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.BackStencilPassOperation
member.summary: The stencil operation to perform when stencil testing and depth testing both pass.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.BackStencilFunction
member.summary: A function that compares stencil data against existing stencil data.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.OpenGL.DepthStencilStateDescriptionGL.#ctor(WaveEngine.Common.Graphics.DepthStencilStateDescription@)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

member.name: T:WaveEngine.OpenGL.RasterizerStateDescriptionGL
member.summary: This struct represent all parameters supported in OpenGL for RasterizerStateDescription.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.OpenGL.RasterizerStateDescriptionGL.#ctor(WaveEngine.Common.Graphics.RasterizerStateDescription@)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

member.name: T:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL
member.summary: This struct represent all parameters supported in OpenGL for SamplerStateDescription.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.TextureWrapS
member.summary: Method to use for resolving a u texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.TextureWrapT
member.summary: Method to use for resolving a v texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.TextureWrapR
member.summary: Method to use for resolving a w texture coordinate that is outside the 0 to 1 range.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.BorderColor
member.summary: Border color to use if D3D11_TEXTURE_ADDRESS_BORDER is specified for AddressU, AddressV, or AddressW. Range must be between 0.0 and 1.0 inclusive.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.ComparisonFunc
member.summary: A function that compares sampled data against existing sampled data.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.MaxAnisotropy
member.summary: Clamping value used if D3D11_FILTER_ANISOTROPIC or D3D11_FILTER_COMPARISON_ANISOTROPIC is specified in Filter. Valid values are between 1 and 16.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.MinLod
member.summary: Offset from the calculated mipmap level. For example, if Direct3D calculates that a texture should be sampled at mipmap level 3 and MipLODBias is 2, then the texture will be sampled at mipmap level 5.

member.name: F:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.MaxLod
member.summary: Upper end of the mipmap range to clamp access to, where 0 is the largest and most detailed mipmap level and any level higher than that is less detailed. This value must be greater than or equal to MinLOD.

member.name: M:WaveEngine.OpenGL.SamplerStateDescriptionGL.#ctor(WaveEngine.Common.Graphics.SamplerStateDescription@)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the struct.

member.summary: Convert to OpenGL texture address mode.
